actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Drug Abuse Office and Treatment Act of 1972 to modify the authorization of appropriations for the program of special project grants and contracts.
subjects: Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

summary.text: Modifies the authorization of appropriations for the program of special project grants and contracts, under the Drug Abuse Office and Treatment Act by providing such sums as may be necessary, rather than specified appropriation amounts.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Drug Abuse Office and Treatment Act of 1972 to modify the authorization of appropriations for the program of special project grants and contracts.
